TextView.android:text: Preventive Maintenance Schedule : Yearly \n ASMGCS SAAB
Combined Earth Pits Earth Resistance (less then 5 ohms)
Neutral to Earth Voltage (less then 3 Volts)

Check all Earth Pits are clean/ accessible. Earth Strip and its connections are not damaged. Check all earthing connections with equipment; Ensure all cabinet eqpt are properly connected with earthing.
